product_name: Core Concepts Mirror Ball Hybrid Shirt - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The women's Core Concepts Mirror Ball Hybrid Shirt with pearl snaps aces hiking, fly fishing and other outdoor fun, thanks to a wind- and water-resistant face fabric and quick-drying lining. Nylon exterior has a durable water repellent finish that helps fend off wind, light rain and paddle splashes. Inner polyester layer is bonded to the nylon and is moisture wicking, breathable and quick drying to keep you comfortable. Core Concepts Mirror Ball Hybrid Shirt features luminous Western-style pearl-face snaps down the center front and on chest pockets and cuffs. Overstock.
short_description: The women's Core Concepts Mirror Ball Hybrid Shirt with pearl snaps aces hiking, fly fishing and other outdoor fun, thanks to a wind- and water-resistant face fabric and quick-drying lining.
